a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}LUGAL-e-mur-an-ni lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ ina UGU UN-MEŠ ša {1}{d}UTU-DINGIR-a.a {LU₂}ARAD ša {1}aš-šur-EN-LAL-in ša LUGAL EN ina ŠU.2 {1}a-bi-si iš-pur-an-ni a-sa-ʾa-al u₂-ta-ṣi-ṣi ma-a {1}{d}IM-rem₂-ni u₂-se-x x x x x x x x x x e-tar-bu ina ŠA₃ x+x x x GEŠTIN x x x x x-hu x x x x x x-ṣu-šu₂
